forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Thunder possible. Low around 10C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low around 50F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening then fog developing overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening then fog developing overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
